Instructions to UPDATE game :
*If you have been previously using our MODDED game 1.0.0p or 1.0.1c then you must have main obb file in /sdcard/android/obb/com.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM/main.10036.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM.obb
*If you have this file then you should now download cracked apk and patch obb
*Extract compressed patch obb and place patch.10225.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM.obb into /sdcard/android/obb/com.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM/ so there will be two files (main obb and patch obb in this folder)
*Install and replace newer apk with installed game and open ENJOY

Instructions to FRESH INSTALL game :
*Simply download all files given below (Cracked apk,patch obb,main obb with 4parts)
*If you are extracting those 4 parts of main obb from ANDROID phone then Download & install https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.zdevs.zarchiver & if you are extracting from machine then use winrar or 7-zip to extract them and move it to your phone
*Extract any one part of zip to /sdcard/android/obb/ so there will be main obb file in folder /sdcard/android/obb/com.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM/
*Extract compressed patch obb and place patch.10225.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM.obb into /sdcard/android/obb/com.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftM5HM/ so there will be two files (main obb and patch obb in this folder)
*Install cracked apk open ENJOY
